17 March 2011 09:00:15 AM

WALSH_PRB
  C version
  Test the WALSH library.

TEST01
  FWT computes a fast Walsh transform.

     I        X(I)    Y=FWT(X)/N   Z=FWT(Y)/N

   0    0.218418    0.409942    0.218418
   1    0.956318    0.016921    0.956318

TEST02

TEST03
  HAAR computes a Haar transform.
  HNORM normalizes the transformed data.
  HAARIN computes an inverse Haar transform.

     I        X(I)    Y=HAAR(X)  Z=HNORM(Y)  W=HAARIN(Z)

   0    0.218418    6.559067    0.409942    0.218418
   1    0.956318    0.270735    0.016921    0.956318
   2    0.829509    1.716980    0.214623    0.829509
   3    0.561695   -0.766044   -0.095756    0.561695
   4    0.415307   -0.216469   -0.054117    0.415307
   5    0.066119    0.113891    0.028473    0.066119
   6    0.257578    0.166529    0.041632    0.257578
   7    0.109957    0.356854    0.089214    0.109957
   8    0.043829   -0.737899   -0.368950    0.043829
   9    0.633966    0.267814    0.133907    0.633966
  10    0.061727    0.349188    0.174594    0.061727
  11    0.449539    0.147621    0.073810    0.449539
  12    0.401306   -0.590137   -0.295068    0.401306
  13    0.754673   -0.387812   -0.193906    0.754673
  14    0.797287   -0.353367   -0.176684    0.797287
  15    0.001838    0.795449    0.397724    0.001838

     I        X(I)    Y=HAAR(X)  Z=HNORM(Y)  W=HAARIN(Z)

   0    1.000000  136.000000    8.500000    1.000000
   1    2.000000  -64.000000   -4.000000    2.000000
   2    3.000000  -16.000000   -2.000000    3.000000

TEST04
  FFWT computes a fast Walsh transform.

     I        X(I)   Y=FFWT(X)/N  Z=FFWT(Y)/N
